definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: The text mainly gives a study on mid-experiment processing of the high calcium milk.
sentences.chinese: 對高鈣液態奶中試加工工藝進行了研究。

sentences.english: Then design honeycomb catalyst for vehical and carry on intermediate test.
sentences.chinese: 並進行了蜂窩狀車載催化劑的設計和中試試驗。

sentences.english: What someone cannot do during waking life, he tries to fulfill in his dreams.
sentences.chinese: 在現實生活中不能做的事情，他會在夢境中試着實現。

sentences.english: Pilot production shows that these technologies are feasible for mass production.
sentences.chinese: 中試證明新工藝用於大生產是可行的。

sentences.english: Recently, process in small size is completed, the process will be maturated in medium size.
sentences.chinese: 目前小試已完成，生產工藝將於中試之後成熟。

sentences.english: At last, the online cleaning was carried out using the Two Way Flow (TWF) technology.
sentences.chinese: 最後進行了雙向流工藝的在線中試研究。

sentences.english: The medium-scale experiment was also conducted.
Participate in and manage new product-related pilot projects.
sentences.chinese: 參與並管理新產品相關的中試項目。

sentences.english: UV primer with pre-treatment function already exists on a pilot-plant scale.
sentences.chinese: 有預處理功能的紫外線已經在中試工廠存在了。

sentences.english: BPC manufacturing plants often produce laboratory scale or "pilot" batches.
sentences.chinese: 原料藥製造廠通常生產實驗式規模或中試規模批次。

sentences.english: Pilot study was conducted to improve water source quality in Lake Taihu by an assembled medium.
sentences.chinese: 採用組合介質進行改善太湖水源地水質的中試研究。

sentences.english: The running of a pilot plant designed according to this model shows definite usefullness of the model.
sentences.chinese: 中試放大表明所得數學模式有一定可用性。

sentences.english: This paper mainly introduces the pilot study of the first chromatogram class acetonitrile.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介紹一級色譜純乙腈的中試研究。

sentences.english: But I will try to compete in some warm-ups before the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 但是我將在奧運會之前，在熱身賽中試着比賽。

definition: to run neck and neck/to keep pace with/to keep abreast of/on a par with one another

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3

definition: (abbr. for 嘗試錯誤|尝试错误) trial and error/failure
to put forward plans and ideas (also derogatory)/to give advice (idiom)
secondary normal school (abbr. for 中等師範學校|中等师范学校[zhong1 deng3 shi1 fan4 xue2 xiao4])
